name: It's Not The End, But You Can See It From Here - Passive Adventure
name_original: It's Not The End, But You Can See It From Here - Passive Adventure
description:
Made using Bitsy in about an hour. 

Bitsy is a great tool for making in-browser pixel-art based games, which you can find here: https://ledoux.itch.io/bitsy

A very short text adventure with various anecdotes relating to digital disruption of society. I ask the user to consider participating in markets thoughtfully on a regular basis.

W, A, S, D keys to control arrow avatar, W to proceed through text.
